text:
How can I obtain the keyword-less function of a keyword-function? E.g. in `foo(; x=true)` , get the corresponding function `#foo#1(true)` ?
Edit: Found out: `MyModule.:(var"#foo#1")`

elements.text: How can I obtain the keyword-less function of a keyword-function? E.g. in
